categories-0.3: Category LibraryContentsIndex
categories-0.3: Category Library
Defines functors, monads, etc over arbitrary categories rather than just endofunctors on the category of types. Also introduces the notion of a category transformer, which generalizes the notion of an Arrow transformer. Using categories in this fashion we can reconstruct BiArrows correctly without any flotsam in the type, and we can similarly construct a number of other useful notions from category theory that do not form Arrows.
